first.en: Take effect immediately type configurations can be modified online.They do not need to be restarted to take effect.
first.cn: “生效类型”为在线生效的配置能进行在线修改，不需要重启就能生效。

second.en: Take effect after restart type configurations can be modified online.But they need to be restarted to take effect.
second.cn: “生效类型”为重启生效的配置能进行在线修改，需要重启后生效。

third.en: Blank reload type configurations cannot be modified online.Synchronization log configurations logfilesz and logfilenum cannot be modified online,although they can be modified in a special way,please refer to [log_synchronization](manual/Distributed_Engine/Maintainance/Database_Configuration/Special_Configuration_Modify/log_synchronization.md).
third.cn: “生效类型”为空的配置不能进行在线修改。同步日志参数 logfilesz 和 logfilenum 虽然不能在线修改配置，但是可以通过特殊方式进行修改，可参考 [logfilesz/logfilenum](manual/Distributed_Engine/Maintainance/Database_Configuration/Special_Configuration_Modify/log_synchronization.md)。
